questions.question: You are hiking along the MacRitchie Trail and spotted a macaque nibbling on something. What do you think macaques feed on? 🌿🍃🐒🚶🏽

options.explanation: Oops, kang kong sambal belachan stays on your dinner table! The macaques' natural diet is widely varied, it includes insects, fruits, flowers, and even lizards, snakes and crabs.🌼🍎🪲🦎🐒 🌳🚶🏽
Oops not quite! Macaques are leaf-ing the life and have a natural diet that is widely varied. They feed on insects, fruits, flowers, and even lizards, snakes and crabs.🌼🍎🪲🦎🐒 🌳🚶🏽

options.text: Fruits, flowers, and even small insects.

options.explanation: Oh snap, you forgot to turn off the camera flash and got too close! 📷💥 The macaques are startled. Walk calmly and put your phone/camera away. 🚶🏽🎒🌿🍃🐒
Excellent choice! 🏆 If you need to pass by a lone macaque or a troop of macaques, calmly walk by and keep at least 2 to 3m distance away from them. 🚶🏽🌿🍃🐒🐒🐒
Yikes! You maintained eye contact with the macaques. They raised their eyebrows, thinking you are being aggressive and threatening. Calmly walk away and avoid eye contact. 🚶🏽😎🌿🍃🐒
Oh no! You flashed a beautiful smile at the macaques. They returned a fearful and anxious expression, and did not smile back at you. Calmly walk away and avoid smiling back. 🚶🏽😶🌿🍃🐒

questions.question: Ready for a quick bite? You feel hungry and took out a sandwich from a plastic bag. The macaques stare on curiously. What would you do? 🚶🏽🥪🍃🐒

options.explanation: Yes, never feed macaques and hide your food away from sight! 🏆 Avoid plastic bags in parks and nature reserves as macaques associate them with food. If you are holding an object that is attracting it, hide it or dispose it properly in a bin.🚶🏽🎒🌿🍃🙈
Oops! Never feed the monkey as the forests provides enough food. Feeding draws them out to human areas. Vehicles have injured and killed many macaques waiting to be fed along the roads.🧍🏻🚫💥🌿🍃🙈
Oops! Do not turn away and run. Hide your food and calmly walk away and avoid eye contact. 🚶🏽🎒🌿🍃🙈
Uh oh! Never try to hit the macaque. Calmly walk away and avoid eye contact. 🚶🏽🚫💥🌿🍃🙈
